strategic_contradiction_index = (identity_tension + emotional_tension + success_tension + relational_tension + goal_tension) / 5

emotional_cohesion_component = (scores["hope"] * salience_scores["hope"] - scores["fear"] * salience_scores["fear"])

relational_cohesion_component = (scores["amity"] * salience_scores["amity"] - scores["enmity"] * salience_scores["enmity"])

identity_cohesion_component = (scores["individual_dignity"] * salience_scores["individual_dignity"] - scores["tribal_dominance"] * salience_scores["tribal_dominance"])

# Salience weight totals
descriptive_salience_total = (salience_scores["hope"] + salience_scores["fear"] + salience_scores["mudita"] + salience_scores["envy"] + salience_scores["amity"] + salience_scores["enmity"])

full_salience_total = (salience_scores["individual_dignity"] + salience_scores["tribal_dominance"] + salience_scores["hope"] + salience_scores["fear"] + salience_scores["mudita"] + salience_scores["envy"] + salience_scores["amity"] + salience_scores["enmity"] + salience_scores["cohesive_goals"] + salience_scores["fragmentative_goals"])

# Final salience-weighted cohesion indices
descriptive_cohesion_index = (emotional_cohesion_component + success_cohesion_component + relational_cohesion_component) / (descriptive_salience_total + 0.001)
motivational_cohesion_index = (emotional_cohesion_component + success_cohesion_component + relational_cohesion_component + goal_cohesion_component) / (motivational_salience_total + 0.001)
full_cohesion_index = (identity_cohesion_component + emotional_cohesion_component + success_cohesion_component + relational_cohesion_component + goal_cohesion_component) / (full_salience_total + 0.001)
